data.title: Alchemy: A structured task distribution for meta-reinforcement learning
data.description: There has been rapidly growing interest in developing methods for meta-learning within deep RL. Although there has been substantive progress toward such ‘meta-reinforcement learning,’ research in this area has been held back by a shortage of benchmark tasks. In the present work, we aim to ease this problem by introducing (and open-sourcing) Alchemy, a useful new benchmark environment for meta-RL, along with a suite of analysis tools.

data.title: Function Optimization With SciPy
data.description: Optimization involves finding the inputs to an objective function that result in the minimum or maximum output of the function. The open-source Python library for scientific computing called SciPy provides a suite of optimization algorithms.
